title: Mijika na Mono ni AGC Ofuro-hen

alternative_titles.ja: 身近なものにAGC お風呂篇

synopsis:
This animation was produced by Towaflo LLC as a production partner, and produced two versions: a male version and a female version. SNS manga artists Saki Kaoru and Atou Rie are in charge of the original work. In addition, the songs used in the commercial are sung by popular voice actors Uchida Maaya and Kaji Yuki, making this work a bit different from the commercial.

(Source: prtimes.jp)
